Package uk.me.berndporr.iirj

Class Cascade

java.lang.Object
uk.me.berndporr.iirj.Cascade
Direct Known Subclasses:
Butterworth, ChebyshevI, ChebyshevII, SOSCascade
public class Cascade extends Object
The mother of all filters. It contains the coefficients of all filter stages as a sequence of 2nd order filters and the states of the 2nd order filters which also imply if it's direct form I or II
